page.title: 16All about me
page.content: I am ten years old and go to Odcombe V.A. Primary School. I live in a large modern house not far away. There are four in my family - mum, dad, sister and me. My dad makes soles for shoes and my mum works on the local fruit farm. We have a pet dog, three fish and a guinea pig. My favourite meals are sausage and chips, and egg and bacon. My favourite puddings are rice pudding and blancmange and custard. I do quite a lot of activities: I collect postcards, soldiers and play mobile. After school on Monday I go to swimming club, I go to scouts on Tuesday, cubs on Wednesday and tennis on Friday. On Thursday evening I watch T.V. At the weekend I do judo on Saturday and stay at home on Sunday. In the summer holidays we usually go to stay in a caravan on a farm in Cornwall or Wales.
